collaboration.title: collaboration
collaboration.text1: MY CURRENT MAIN PROFESSIONAL FOCUS IS TRANSITIONING FROM ENTERTAINMENT PRODUCTION TO IT
collaboration.text2: I am passionate about how dynamic creativity and humanities knowledge can blend with digital technologies.

text3.first: This website illustrates this interest and experiments with selling expertise —in the form of

text1.title: Personal Brand and Media Image
text1.p: This is for individuals and communities looking to define and express their uniqueness through media channels.

text2.title: Creative Career
text2.p: When faced with challenges in development—be they psychological, infrastructural, or conceptual—we will find a way forward

text3.title: Other
text3.p: Or something else where that might be useful: let's dive into the world of transforming education, delve into the cultural diversity of the Caucasus region, and contemplate the nature of Creativity.

text4.title: Shows and Podcasts
text4.p: Advice on strengthening existing or planned content, including conceptual, substantive, and management aspects.

text5.title: Stand-Up
text5.p: This is for individuals actively performing, managing, or interested in understanding comedic skills — authorial, artistic, and production-related.

text1.title: Conceptualizing Media Projects
text1.p: Developing creative concepts for show projects, educational media, advertising, promotional activities, and other meaningful content.

text2.title: Event Management
text2.p: Planning and conducting entertainment and educational events.

text3.title: Conflict Mediation
text3.p: Theoretical and practical mediation assistance in resolving conflicts, including media-related conflicts.

text4.title: Scripts (Any Format)
text4.p: We can work with any script format. If we can’t do it, we will find good performers.

text5.title: Turnkey Filming
text5.p: Content production at all stages or assistance in managing processes.
